function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of specific policy measures for startups","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived mismatch between startup characteristics and government support services can lead to a lack of access to necessary resources for maintaining health and safety standards.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased effectiveness of travel restrictions in widespread outbreak","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing public health benefits with negative impacts on freedom of movement, economy, and society","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global downturn and growing antagonisms between major powers","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security risks associated with proposed reduction in global defense spending to finance environmental and emissions reduction schemes","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Competing policy frames leading to conflicting approaches to climate and public health crises.","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on subsidiarity principle for eu-wide response to climate change impacts","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in land use and zoning due to remote living and working","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces to residential units leading to increased population density in downtown areas","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of office spaces in city centers to residential units could lead to changes in population density and potential disease exposure.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Customized policy responses to covid-19 are important based on the local situation and the needs of local people.","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Globalization and interconnectivity conventions could be challenged, leading to changes in politics and multi-scalar policies.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"}]}
